snippet: Greece and the eurozone fail to settle their differences over debt. | Credit Suisse swings to a profit in the fourth quarter. | A corruption scandal at Petrobras is threatening Brazil’s bond market. | Disclosure and transparency have become a...
abstract: Greece and the eurozone fail to settle their differences over debt. | Credit Suisse swings to a profit in the fourth quarter. | A corruption scandal at Petrobras is threatening Brazil’s bond market. | Disclosure and transparency have become a regulatory crutch.

headline.main: Morning Agenda: No Agreement on Greek Bailout
